Message:
The flames are getting closer...!
W...We have to save
that wolf girl’s mother fast...!

“What are you spacing out for?!
Do your whole deity thing
and save her, quick...!”

The wolf girl wouldn’t move
even when I yanked her hand.
What the hell is her problem?!

“You’re different from me!
You have the power to save
your mother, so what are you
waiting for?!”

This girl has the power to
fend off the city soldiers
all by herself...

If I’d had that kind of
power back then...!

I could have saved my friends,
or countless others...
So, why is she hesitating...?!

“The weak...are destined to die...
That’s why, I can’t...”

Hearing those words,
I slapped her cheek
without a second thought.

“You don’t just abandon
who’s most important to you
just because they’re weak!

After taking in everything
I’d yelled at her, the girl
ran to her mother’s side,
tears in her eyes.

Now, if we can just
push that pillar off...!

The flames are almost on us...
Crap, at this rate...!

Nrgh...! I’m scared...!
What should I do?
What do I...?!

“Ugh, enough already...!
Get out of your head,
and just focus!”

Just then, something
inside me shot out...
